message: 'de.simonsator.partyandfriends.spigot.api.pafplayers.PAFPlayer' should be separated from previous import group by one line.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.stream.Collectors' import. Should be before 'org.bukkit.entity.Player'.
Abbreviation in name 'PAFBPartyHandlerImpl' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
